TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants , Mr PERSON , PERSON and Mr PERSON , are NORP nationals , who were born in DATE and DATE respectively . They all live in FAC and were represented before ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
CARDINAL . The first applicant died on DATE .
CARDINAL . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . During DATE and DATE NORP paramilitary forces gained control over CARDINAL of the territory of GPE and proclaimed the “ GPE ” ( NORP autonomna oblast LOC , hereinafter “ LOC ” ) . At DATE the NORP authorities announced their intention to take military action with the aim of regaining control over “ LOC ” . The operation was codenamed “ Storm ” and took place from CARDINAL to CARDINAL DATE . Before the military action , the vast majority of the population of “ LOC ” had fled GPE . They went firstly to GPE , and later on many of them went to live in GPE . Some returned to GPE after the war . The number of people who fled is estimated at CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . In DATE the authorities learned that a close relative of the applicants , ORG , had been killed during the operation “ Storm ” or immediately afterwards , in DATE , on the territory of “ LOC ” . The police opened an inquiry into the circumstances of his death .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the police interviewed the first and second applicants , who had no direct knowledge about the circumstances in which ORG had died .

CARDINAL . M.L. , also interviewed in DATE , said that in DATE she had been in a convoy comprising people , tractors and “ military armoured vehicles ” . ORG had also been in that convoy . He had been dressed in a NORP army uniform and had been wearing an army mask . The convoy had been attacked but she had not seen how ORG had died . PERSON , interviewed at the same time , confirmed PERSON ’s statement .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged a criminal complaint with the ORG Attorney ’s ORG against unknown perpetrators in connection with the killing of ORG
CARDINAL . On DATE the body of ORG was exhumed . It was dressed in a military uniform with a military identity card .

CARDINAL . On DATE the GPE State Attorney ’s ORG dismissed the applicants’ criminal complaint on the grounds that ORG had been killed in combat between a unit of the paramilitary NORP forces and LAW of the ORG of GPE . This decision was served on the ORG representative on DATE .
